var theForm = document.forms['aspnetForm'];
if (!theForm) {
    theForm = document.aspnetForm;
}
function __doPostBack(eventTarget, eventArgument) {
    if (!theForm.onsubmit || (theForm.onsubmit() != false)) {
        theForm.__EVENTTARGET.value = eventTarget;
        theForm.__EVENTARGUMENT.value = eventArgument;
        theForm.submit();
    }
}

<script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
(function(){

        if (typeof(_spBodyOnLoadFunctions) === 'undefined' || _spBodyOnLoadFunctions === null) {
            return;
        }
        _spBodyOnLoadFunctions.push(function() 
        {
          ExecuteOrDelayUntilScriptLoaded(
            function()
            {
              var pairs = SP.ScriptHelpers.getDocumentQueryPairs();
              var followDoc, itemId, listId, docName;
              for (var key in pairs)
              {
                if(key.toLowerCase() == 'followdocument') 
                  followDoc = pairs[key];
                else if(key.toLowerCase() == 'itemid') 
                  itemId = pairs[key];
                else if(key.toLowerCase() == 'listid') 
                  listId = pairs[key];
                else if(key.toLowerCase() == 'docname') 
                  docName = decodeURI(pairs[key]);
              } 

              if(followDoc != null && followDoc == '1' && listId!=null && itemId != null && docName != null)
              {
                SP.SOD.executeFunc('followingcommon.js', 'FollowDocumentFromEmail', function() 
                { 
                  FollowDocumentFromEmail(itemId, listId, docName);
                });
              }

            }, 'SP.init.js');

        });
    })();(function(){

        if (typeof(_spBodyOnLoadFunctions) === 'undefined' || _spBodyOnLoadFunctions === null) {
            return;
        }
        _spBodyOnLoadFunctions.push(function() {

            if (typeof(SPClientTemplates) === 'undefined' || SPClientTemplates === null || (typeof(APD_InAssetPicker) === 'function' && APD_InAssetPicker())) {
                return;
            }

            var renderFollowFooter = function(renderCtx,  calloutActionMenu)
            {
                if (renderCtx.ListTemplateType == 700) 
                    myDocsActionsMenuPopulator(renderCtx, calloutActionMenu);
                else
                    CalloutOnPostRenderTemplate(renderCtx, calloutActionMenu);

                var listItem = renderCtx.CurrentItem;
                if (typeof(listItem) === 'undefined' || listItem === null) {
                    return;
                }
                if (listItem.FSObjType == 0) {
                    calloutActionMenu.addAction(new CalloutAction({
                        text: Strings.STS.L_CalloutFollowAction,
                        tooltip: Strings.STS.L_CalloutFollowAction_Tooltip,
                        onClickCallback: function (calloutActionClickEvent, calloutAction) {
                            var callout = GetCalloutFromRenderCtx(renderCtx);
                            if (!(typeof(callout) === 'undefined' || callout === null))
                                callout.close();
                            SP.SOD.executeFunc('followingcommon.js', 'FollowSelectedDocument', function() { FollowSelectedDocument(renderCtx); });
                        }
                    }));
                }
            };

            var registerOverride = function(id) {
                var followingOverridePostRenderCtx = {};
                followingOverridePostRenderCtx.BaseViewID = 'Callout';
                followingOverridePostRenderCtx.ListTemplateType = id;
                followingOverridePostRenderCtx.Templates = {};
                followingOverridePostRenderCtx.Templates.Footer = function(renderCtx) {
                    var  renderECB;
                    if (typeof(isSharedWithMeView) === 'undefined' || isSharedWithMeView === null) {
                        renderECB = true;
                    } else {
                        var viewCtx = getViewCtxFromCalloutCtx(renderCtx);
                        renderECB = !isSharedWithMeView(viewCtx);
                    }
                    return CalloutRenderFooterTemplate(renderCtx, renderFollowFooter, renderECB);
                };
                SPClientTemplates.TemplateManager.RegisterTemplateOverrides(followingOverridePostRenderCtx);
            }
            registerOverride(101);
            registerOverride(700);
        });
    })();if (typeof(DeferWebFormInitCallback) == 'function') DeferWebFormInitCallback();function WebForm_OnSubmit() {
UpdateFormDigest('\u002fPersonas', 1440000);if (typeof(_spFormOnSubmitWrapper) != 'undefined') {return _spFormOnSubmitWrapper();} else {return true;};
return true;
}

                                                                                                                <h4>
                                        Préstamos

                                                                                          
                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                </h4>
                                                                                                                <div class="description">
                                                                                                                    <p>
                                            No importa lo que desees, tenemos un préstamo para ayudarte a hacerlo realidad.

	<!-- Bocao Food Fest -->
		<style>
		@media screen and (min-width:1200px){
			.imagen-bocao-food-fest{
				display:inline;
			}
			.contenedor-bocao-food-fest{
				left:95%;
				margin-left:0px;
			}
		}
		@media screen and (max-width:1200px) and (min-width:990px){
			.imagen-bocao-food-fest{
				display:none;
			}
			.contenedor-bocao-food-fest{
				left:87%;
				margin-left:-190px;
			}
		}
		@media screen and (max-width:990px){
			.imagen-bocao-food-fest{
				display:none;
			}
			.contenedor-bocao-food-fest{
				left:76%;
				margin-left:-190px;
			}
		}
		.imagen-bocao-food-fest{
			transform: scale(0,0);
			-webkit-animation: agrandar 0.6s ease-in-out 0.2s forwards; /* Safari 4.0 - 8.0 */
		    animation: agrandar 0.6s ease-in-out 0.2s forwards;
		}
		/*
		.imagen-bocao-food-fest{
			transform: rotate(0deg);
			-webkit-animation: girar 1s ease-in-out infinite;
		    animation: girar 1s ease-in-out infinite;
		}
		*/
		.contenedor-bocao-food-fest contenedor num1{
			transform: scale(0,0);
		    -webkit-animation: agrandar 0.6s ease-in-out 0.2s forwards; /* Safari 4.0 - 8.0 */
		    animation: agrandar 0.6s ease-in-out 0.2s forwards;
		}
		.contenedor-bocao-food-fest contenedor num2{
			transform: scale(0,0);
			-webkit-animation: agrandar 0.6s ease-in-out 0.4s forwards; /* Safari 4.0 - 8.0 */
		    animation: agrandar 0.6s ease-in-out 0.4s forwards;
		}
		.contenedor-bocao-food-fest contenedor num3{
			transform: scale(0,0);
		    -webkit-animation: agrandar 0.4s ease-in-out 0.6s forwards; /* Safari 4.0 - 8.0 */
		    animation: agrandar 0.4s ease-in-out 0.6s forwards;
		}
		.contenedor-bocao-food-fest contenedor num4{
			transform: scale(0,0);
		    -webkit-animation: agrandar 0.6s ease-in-out 0.8s forwards; /* Safari 4.0 - 8.0 */
		    animation: agrandar 0.6s ease-in-out 0.8s forwards;
		}
		.contenedor-bocao-food-fest contenedor num5{
			transform: scale(0,0);
		    -webkit-animation: agrandar 0.6s ease-in-out 1s forwards; /* Safari 4.0 - 8.0 */
		    animation: agrandar 0.6s ease-in-out 1s forwards;
		}
		.contenedor-bocao-food-fest contenedor num6{
			transform: scale(0,0);
		    -webkit-animation: agrandar 0.6s ease-in-out 1.2s forwards; /* Safari 4.0 - 8.0 */
		    animation: agrandar 0.6s ease-in-out 1.2s forwards;
		}
		.contenedor-bocao-food-fest .btn-bocao-food{
			transform: scale(0,0);
		    -webkit-animation: agrandar 0.6s ease-in-out 1.4s forwards; /* Safari 4.0 - 8.0 */
		    animation: agrandar 0.6s ease-in-out 1.4s forwards;
		}
		</style>
		<!--Bocao Food Fest
		<div class="swiper-slide">
			<div class="fullbleed-wrapper hidden-xs main" style="background-color:#ffda9a;">
				<div class="left-tint">
				</div>
				<div class="fullbleed-wrapper-inner">
					<div class="container">
						<div class="row">

	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 2px 15px 0px rgba(0,0,0,1);

	/*overflow:hidden;*/
	opacity:0.85;
	display:none;
}

<script src="../../../_catalogs/masterpage/BPD/js/vendor/jquery-1.11.0.min.js"></script>  
<script>
	function modalDenis(){
	
		//Para Modal Promo 10% descuento en tiendas
		//$('#btn-modal-promo').click(function(e){
		    $('.forawshadow_db, .forAW_db').fadeIn(300);
		//});
		
		$('forAWshadow, forAW .closeX span').click(function(){
		    $('.forawshadow_db, .forAW_db').fadeOut(300);
		});
	
	};
</script>
<script>
	
	//CODIGO DE LIGHTBOX
	$(document).on('click', '.copaLibertadoresBtn', function(){
		//PROMOCION PARA BABNNER DE FUTBALL
		$('popUp').css({'backgroundImage':'url("/SiteCollectionImages/personas/banner/fondoBannerCopaLlibertadores2017.jpg")'});

		$('popUp').fadeOut(400);
		$('fondoPopUp').fadeOut(400);

	var starv0=true,starv1=true,starv2=true,starv3=true;	
	
	
	star0(starv0);
	star1(starv1);
	star2(starv2);
	star3(starv3);
	
	/** STARTS LOOP FOR STAR0 **/
		function star0(star0Value){
			if(star0Value === true){	
				$('.star0').css({'opacity':0.2,}); 				
				starv0 = false;
			}else{
				$('.star0').css({'opacity':1,}); 
				starv0 = true;
			};
			setTimeout(function(){
				star0(starv0);
			},2501);
		};
	/** ENDS LOOP FOR STAR0 **/
	

	/** STARTS LOOP FOR STAR1 **/
		function star1(star1Value){
			if(star1Value === true){	
				$('.star1').css({'opacity':0.1,}); 				
				starv1 = false;
			}else{
				$('.star1').css({'opacity':0.5,}); 
				starv1 = true;
			};
			setTimeout(function(){
				star1(starv1);
			},1856);
		};
	/** ENDS LOOP FOR STAR1 **/
	
	
	/** STARTS LOOP FOR STAR2 **/
		function star2(star2Value){
			if(star2Value === true){	
				$('.star2').css({'opacity':0.1,}); 				
				starv2 = false;
			}else{
				$('.star2').css({'opacity':0.7,}); 
				starv2 = true;
			};
			setTimeout(function(){
				star2(starv2);
			},853);
		};
	/** ENDS LOOP FOR STAR2 **/
	
	/** STARTS LOOP FOR STAR3 **/
		function star3(star3Value){
			if(star3Value === true){	
				$('.star3').css({'opacity':0.2,}); 				
				starv3 = false;
			}else{
				$('.star3').css({'opacity':0.7,}); 
				starv3 = true;
			};
			setTimeout(function(){
				star3(starv3);
			},2463);
		};
	/** ENDS LOOP FOR STAR3 **/


		
$(function(){

	$('.mascara').addClass('mascaraFinal');
	//SCRIPT PARA PROMO DE BANNER AGORAMALL//
	 detectR();
	 
	$(window).resize(function(){
	 detectR();
	});
	
	function detectR(){
	
	var screenResolution = (document.body.clientWidth);
	
	if( screenResolution < 1100){
	 $("#changeIMGpromo").addClass("fondoMovil").removeClass("fondoDesk");
	}else{
	 $("#changeIMGpromo").addClass("fondoDesk").removeClass("fondoMovil");
	 };
	};
	//SCRIPT PARA PROMO DE BANNER AGORAMALL//
	
	bannerMobil();
	
	function bannerMobil(){
		//CONTROLES DEL BANNER MOVIL
		$("body").on("click",".btnCerrar",function(){
				$(".bannerMobile").hide(400);
				crearCookie();
		});
		
		//FUNCION QUE DETECTA CUAL DISPOSITVO SE ESTA USANDO
		var isMobile = {
		    Android: function() {
		        return navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i);
		    },
		    BlackBerry: function() {
		        return navigator.userAgent.match(/BlackBerry/i);
		    },
		    iOS: function() {
		        return navigator.userAgent.match(/iPhone/i);
		    },
		    iOSextra: function() {
		        return navigator.userAgent.match(/iPad|iPod/i);
		    },
		    Opera: function() {
		        return navigator.userAgent.match(/Opera Mini/i);
		    },
		    Windows: function() {
		        return navigator.userAgent.match(/IEMobile/i);
		    },
		    any: function() {
		        return (isMobile.Android() || isMobile.BlackBerry() || isMobile.iOS() || isMobile.Opera() || isMobile.Windows());
		    }
		};
		if(isMobile.Android()){
			if(comprobarCookie()!='si'){
				$("body").prepend("<div class='bannerMobile'><div class='btnCerrar'></div><div class='imagenBM'><img src='/SiteCollectionImages/redes-sociales-iconos/bpd250x250.jpg'></div><div class='tituloBM'>Banco Popular Dominicano</div><div class='descripcionBM'>GRATIS - en Google Play</div><a href='#'><div class='btnVerBM'>Descargar</div></a></div>");
				$(".bannerMobile").show(400);			
				$(".bannerMobile a").on("click",function(){
					window.location.href="market://details?id=com.popular.app.android";
				});	
			};			
		}
		if(isMobile.iOS()){
			if(comprobarCookie()!='si'){
				$("body").prepend("<div class='bannerMobile'><div class='btnCerrar'></div><div class='imagenBM'><img src='/SiteCollectionImages/redes-sociales-iconos/bpd250x250.jpg'></div><div class='tituloBM'>Banco Popular Dominicano</div><div class='descripcionBM'>GRATIS - en App Store</div><a href='#'><div class='btnVerBM'>Descargar</div></a></div>");
				$(".bannerMobile").show(400);			
				$(".bannerMobile a").on("click",function(){
					window.location.href="itmss://itunes.apple.com/us/app/galactic-insects/id583475424?ls=1mt=8";
				});	
			};
		}
		if(isMobile.Opera()){
			if(comprobarCookie()!='si'){
				$("body").prepend("<div class='bannerMobile'><div class='btnCerrar'></div><div class='imagenBM'><img src='/SiteCollectionImages/redes-sociales-iconos/bpd250x250.jpg'></div><div class='tituloBM'>Banco Popular Dominicano</div><div class='descripcionBM'>GRATIS - en App Store</div><a href='#'><div class='btnVerBM'>Descargar</div></a></div>");
				$(".bannerMobile").show(400);			
				$(".bannerMobile a").on("click",function(){
					window.location.href="itmss://itunes.apple.com/us/app/galactic-insects/id583475424?ls=1mt=8";
				});
			};
		} 
		if(isMobile.Windows()){
			//alert('Opera');
		} 
		if(isMobile.BlackBerry()){
			//alert('Windows');
		}
		
		function crearCookie(){
			document.cookie = "b5A8n1n6E1r5m8O6b4I2l=si; max-age=2592000; path=/";
		}; 
		
		function leerCookie(){
			var name = "b5A8n1n6E1r5m8O6b4I2l" + "=";
    		var ca = document.cookie.split(';');

			for(var i=0; i<ca.length; i++) {
		        var c = ca[i];
		        while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1);
		        if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		    }
			return "";
		};
		
		function comprobarCookie() {
		    var clave = leerCookie();
		    if (clave!="") {
		        return 'si';
		    }else{
		      	return 'no';
		    }
		};		
	};
	
	
	
	
	
	
	//FUNCTION QUE MANERAJARA LA COOKIES PARA EL POP UP QUE POSEE EL MENSAJE DE LOS CAJEROS SE PUEDE BORRAR ESTE CODIGO LUEGO DE QUE ESTE AVISO SE REMUEVA
	//popUpAvisosDeCajeros();
	
	function popUpAvisosDeCajeros(){
		if(cookieComprobarPopUpCajeros()=='si'){
			//NO SE HACE NADA
			//alert(cookieComprobarPopUpCajeros);
		}else{
			$('fondoPopUp, popUp').fadeIn('400');
		};
		
		$('popUp .bt-cerrar, fondoPopUp').click(function(){
			coookieCrearPopUpCajeros();
			$('fondoPopUp, popUp').fadeOut('400');
		});
		
		//LEE COOKIES PARA QUE ABRA O NO EL POP UP
		function coookieLeerPopUpCajeros(){
			var name = "b2a3n9c4o7P8o3p4u6l0a3r5P7o8p2U5p6C1a6j8e9r0o825" + "=";
    		var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
			
			for(var i=0; i<ca.length; i++) {
		        var c = ca[i];
		        while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1);
		        if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		    }
			return "";
		};
		
		//COMPRUEBA SI EXISTE LA COOKIE
		function cookieComprobarPopUpCajeros(){
			var clave = coookieLeerPopUpCajeros();
			//alert(clave)
		    if (clave!="") {
		        return 'si';
		    }else{
		      	return 'no';
		    }
		};
		
		//CREAR COOKIES PARA QUE NO VUELVA A ABRIR EL POP UP
		function coookieCrearPopUpCajeros(){
			document.cookie = "b2a3n9c4o7P8o3p4u6l0a3r5P7o8p2U5p6C1a6j8e9r0o825=si; max-age=2592000; path=/";
		};
		//PARA BORRAR COOKIES SE USA ESTO
		//document.cookie = "b2a3n9c4o7P8o3p4u6l0a3r5P7o8p2U5p6C1a6j8e9r0o82a=si; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT; path=/";
	};

	
	
	
	
});
</script>

<script>
	var slideSection3 = new Swiper('.swiper-container-section3',{
		mode: 'horizontal',
		loop: true,
		pagination: '.swiper-pagination-section3',
        createPagination: true,
        paginationClickable: true,
        calculateHeight: true,
        resizeReInit: true
	});
	
    $('.arrow-right-section3').click(function (e) {
    	e.preventDefault();
        slideSection3.swipeNext();
    });
            
    $('.arrow-left-section3').click(function (e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        slideSection3.swipePrev();
    });
</script>

                                                                                                                <script>//<![CDATA[
                                                                                                                	$(function(){
                                                                                                                		//DETECTAMOS EL TAMAÑO DE LA PANTALLA
                                                                                                                		var widthP = $(window).width();
                                                                                                   						
                                                                                                   						//CAMBIAMOS EL VALOR DE LA VARIBLE CUANDO LA PAGINA SE REDIMENCIONA
                                                                                                   						$(window).resize(function(){
                                                                                                   							widthP = $(window).width();
                                                                                                   						});
                                                                                                   						
                                                                                                                		//CODIGO DE LIGHTBOX AL HACER CLICK EN EL ICONO DE SNAP SHAT
																														$(document).on('click', '.snapchat-icon', function(){
																															if(widthP>750){
                                                                                                                				//VEMOS SI EL POPUP FUE INSERTADO
                                                                                                                				if($('popUpSnapShat').size()>0){
                                                                                                                					$('popUpSnapShat').fadeIn(400);
																																	$('fondoPopUpSnapShat').fadeIn(400);
                                                                                                                				}else{
                                                                                                                					$('body').append('<fondoPopUpSnapShat style="float:left;position:fixed;width:100%;height:110%;top:0px;background-color:#000;opacity:0.8;z-index:999; display:none;"></fondoPopUpSnapShat><popUpSnapShat style="float:left;position:fixed; margin-top:100px; left:50%; margin-left:-175px; width:350px; height:auto; top:0px; z-index:1000; display:none;"><div class="bt-cerrar" style="cursor:pointer;"><img src="/SiteCollectionImages/redes-sociales-iconos/x.png" style="margin-left:350px;"></div><img src="/SiteCollectionImages/redes-sociales-iconos/snapcodebpd.png" style="position:relative;display:block;width:100%;height:auto;max-width:350px;margin:auto;z-index:0;"></popUpSnapShat>');
                                                                                                                					$('popUpSnapShat').fadeIn(400);
																																	$('fondoPopUpSnapShat').fadeIn(400);
                                                                                                                				};
	                                                                                                                		}else{
	                                                                                                                			window.open('https://www.snapchat.com/add/popularenlinea', '_blank');
	                                                                                                                		};																															
																														});
																														//AL HACER CLICK SONBRE EL FONDO DEL POP UP O SOBRE EL BOTON DE CERRAR DEL BOTON
																														$(document).on('click','fondoPopUpSnapShat, popUpSnapShat .bt-cerrar',function(){
																															$('popUpSnapShat').fadeOut(400);
																															$('fondoPopUpSnapShat').fadeOut(400);
																														});
                                                                                                                	});

                                                                                <div id="DeltaFormDigest">
<script type="text/javascript">//<![CDATA[
        var formDigestElement = document.getElementsByName('__REQUESTDIGEST')[0];
        if (!((formDigestElement == null) || (formDigestElement.tagName.toLowerCase() != 'input') || (formDigestElement.type.toLowerCase() != 'hidden') ||
            (formDigestElement.value == null) || (formDigestElement.value.length <= 0)))
        {
            formDigestElement.value = '0x7C9D297781825A8A7712D9DD6667C642644897A3D052FFA9348774A909837D18490CB49BBF1019AB2352F61FC86581D901EF0E0DBB3A095E0D3B8F6AB191E478,07 Oct 2017 06:57:50 -0000';
            g_updateFormDigestPageLoaded = new Date();
        }
        //]]>
        </script>
</div>

function _RegisterWebPartPageCUI()
{
    var initInfo = {editable: false,isEditMode: false,allowWebPartAdder: false,listId: "{22722038-5fce-4cb3-91f1-aac0da990170}",itemId: 60,recycleBinEnabled: true,enableMinorVersioning: true,enableModeration: false,forceCheckout: true,rootFolderUrl: "\u002fPersonas\u002fPaginas",itemPermissions:{High:16,Low:196673}};
    SP.Ribbon.WebPartComponent.registerWithPageManager(initInfo);
    var wpcomp = SP.Ribbon.WebPartComponent.get_instance();
    var hid;
    hid = document.getElementById("_wpSelected");
    if (hid != null)
    {
        var wpid = hid.value;
        if (wpid.length > 0)
        {
            var zc = document.getElementById(wpid);
            if (zc != null)
                wpcomp.selectWebPart(zc, false);
        }
    }
    hid = document.getElementById("_wzSelected");
    if (hid != null)
    {
        var wzid = hid.value;
        if (wzid.length > 0)
        {
            wpcomp.selectWebPartZone(null, wzid);
        }
    }
};
